2. EXPORT THE VARIABLES

export OCP_RELEASE=4.7.13
export LOCAL_SECRET_JSON=/tmp/pullsecret.json
export REMOVABLE_MEDIA_PATH=/tmp
export PRODUCT_REPO=openshift-release-dev
export OCP_RELEASE=4.7.13
export ARCHITECTURE=s390x
export GODEBUG=x509ignoreCN=0

* REPLACE THE REMOVABLE MEDIA_PATH WITH THE FS YOU'VE CREATED FOR THE IMAGES

3. MIRROR TO DISK

oc adm release mirror -a ${LOCAL_SECRET_JSON} --to-dir=${REMOVABLE_MEDIA_PATH}/mirror quay.io/${PRODUCT_REPO}/${RELEASE_NAME}:${OCP_RELEASE}-${ARCHITECTURE}
